androidx.leanback.widget

Class SearchOrbView.Colors

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.leanback.widget.SearchOrbView.Colors
  • Enclosing class:
    SearchOrbView

    public static class SearchOrbView.Colors
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of colors used to display the search orb.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int brightColor
      A brighter version of the search orb used for animation.
      int color
      The main color of the search orb.
      int iconColor
      A color used to tint the search orb icon.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a color set using the given colors for the search orb.

      Constructs a color set using the given colors.

        Constructs a color set using the given color for the search orb. Other colors are provided by the framework.

        Constructs a color set using the given colors for the search orb. Other colors are provided by the framework.

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
